subject: Basketball (College)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mr. Majerus, who was awaiting a heart transplant, compiled more than 500 wins combined at Marquette, Ball State, Utah and St. Louis University.
snippet: Mr. Majerus, who was awaiting a heart transplant, compiled more than 500 wins combined at Marquette, Ball State, Utah and St. Louis University.
